heroSection.title: Full Stack Developer
heroSection.description: A dedicated Full Stack Developer with a frontend focus and 5+ years of experience, proficient in JavaScript, React, TypeScript, and MongoDB. I have contributed to more than 30 projects, including those in the fintech sector.
heroSection.photoAlt: Photo of Liza Blomdahl, a Full Stack Developer

experiences.companyTitle: Purple Technology – Brno, Czech Republic & Remote
experiences.responsibilities:
- Contributed significantly to the development of an internal CRM system as a Full Stack Developer.
- Involved in the entire development lifecycle, from technical analysis and estimation to backend and frontend integration.
- Participated in the design and implementation of new features.
- Followed structured development phases including unit testing and final testing.
- Worked with CI/CD pipelines to ensure quality and efficiency.
- Contributed to the development of a client portal, similar to internet banking experience (forex).
- Focused on improving the portal's capabilities through the migration from GraphQL to tRPC.

- Primarily focused on developing reusable components for integration into Storybook.
- Designed and implemented components to enhance UI consistency.

- Specialized in front-end development with additional experience in back-end development.
- Developed responsive styling for web and mobile projects.
- Worked on diverse projects using various programming languages and libraries.

degrees.responsibilities:
- Earned a Bachelor's in Software Development.
- Mastered cloud technologies and modern programming stacks, including JavaScript, Python, React, and NodeJS.
- Gained practical experience from hackathons and industry internships.
- Prepared for advanced software roles through hands-on projects.
- Thesis focused on optimizing MongoDB queries and enhancing application performance with advanced sorting, searching, and filtering techniques. Thesis available [**here**](https://theses.unicornuniversity.net/olsevskaja-jelizaveta).

degrees.companyTitle: Prague University of Economics and Business – Prague, Czech Republic
degrees.responsibilities:
- Studied Applied Informatics with a focus on business applications.
- Gained foundational IT skills and a deep understanding of micro- and macroeconomics, business processes, and statistics.
- Completed an intensive 1.5 years of study, equipping me with critical abilities in data processing, Java coding, and economic analysis.
- Prepared for diverse roles in tech and business sectors.
- Acquired practical insights into designing information systems and analyzing databases.
- Drove business development through effective data-supported solutions.
